dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 129 IH: Abolish the ATF Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Boebert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To abolish the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Abolish the ATF Act.

section.header: Abolishment of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives
section.text: The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives is hereby abolished.
